thread.title: The best hotel in town. Period.
thread.title_full: The best hotel in town. Period. - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: yanivst1
title: The best hotel in town. Period.
text:
It's my 5th visit in town. Rosewood was a big question mark . Finally, the best hotel for 2017 so far. The standard room size like a junior suite, top amenities, top restaurants and above all- presidential service!!!!
Room Tip: Ask for a room at the 23rd floor See more room tips
